nodes.text: The Hellion's Dare was an EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate captained by the Chadra-Fan Kreskian in the service of the New Republic. Following the Battle of Endor, it was assigned to scouting missions, embarking Riot Squadron and Hound Squadron. The vessel was attacked over Jiruus, barely escaping to hyperspace.
Hellion's Dare appears in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
